member.name: T:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.XsdTask
member.summary: Compiles an XML Schema into a Microsoft.NET Assembly containing types that can marshal back and forth from XML elements and the objects that represent them. Also can create a W3C XML schema from an existing Microsoft.NET Assembly, XML document, or an old XDR format schema.

example.code: <xsd schema="MySchema.xsd" element="MyRootElement" language="CS" namespace="MyCompany.MySchema" outputdir="build\bin" uri="http://MySchema'sTargetNamespace" />
example.para: Generate a schema from an Assembly.
Generate a schema from an XML doc.
Generate a schema from an XDR schema.

member.name: M:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.XsdTask.InitializeTask(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Initializes task and ensures the supplied attributes are valid.
member.param: Xml node used to define this task instance.

member.name: P:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.XsdTask.Target
member.summary: Target of XML Schema compilation. Can be "classes" or "dataset".

member.name: P:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.XsdTask.Element
member.summary: XML element in the Schema to process.

member.name: P:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.XsdTask.Language
member.summary: Language of generated code. 'CS', 'VB', 'JS', or the fully-qualified name of a class implementing System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomCompiler.

member.name: P:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.XsdTask.OutputDir
member.summary: Output directory in which to place generated files.

member.name: P:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.XsdTask.Assembly
member.summary: Assembly (.dll or .exe) to generate a W3C XML Schema for.

member.name: P:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.XsdTask.Types
member.summary: Types in the assembly for which an XML schema is being created. If you don't specify this, all types in the assembly will be included.

member.name: P:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.XsdTask.Uri
member.summary: Uri of elements from the Schema to process.

member.name: P:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.XsdTask.XmlDoc
member.summary: XML document to generate a W3C XML Schema for.

member.name: P:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.XsdTask.Xdr
member.summary: XDR schema to generate a W3C XML Schema for.
